data.feedback: Plan fully covers all 9 Flutter frontend requirements with correct backend API alignment. Clean Architecture properly structured. WebSocket events match backend exactly. Minor filesToRead references to non-existent service files are non-blocking as actual routes/models exist.
issues: Minor: filesToRead references src/services/ which doesn't exist (backend uses controllers)
Minor: filesToRead references src/types/index.ts which doesn't exist
Minor: epic-realtime-client has duplicate epic-dashboard in dependencies array
suggestions: Update filesToRead to reference controllers instead of services
